dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 2043 IH: Agricultural Commodities Price Enhancement Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Davis of North Carolina introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To increase the reference prices for certain commodities, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Agricultural Commodities Price Enhancement Act.

section.header: Reference price increases for wheat, corn, soybeans, peanuts, and seed cotton
section.text: Section 1111(19) is amended of the Agricultural Act of 2014 (7 U.S.C. 9011(19)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (A), by striking $5.50 per bushel and inserting $6.50 per bushel;
in subparagraph (B), by striking $3.70 per bushel and inserting $4.20 per bushel;
in subparagraph (H), by striking $8.40 per bushel and inserting $10.00 per bushel;
in subparagraph (J), by striking $535.00 per ton and inserting $635.00 per ton; and
in subparagraph (O), by striking $0.367 per pound and inserting $0.45 per pound.
